Class Bill

java.lang.Object
Bill
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bill extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a bill item.
Author:
Name: Damian Curran, Student ID: 1331249

  • Constructor Details

    • Bill

      public Bill(String bid, String mid, float amount, boolean used)
      Constructor of the Bill class.
      Parameters:
      bid - The bill id, String.
      mid - The member id, String.
      amount - The bill amount, float.
      used - Boolean indicating if bill previously used to purchase entries.

  • Method Details

    • isValidFormat

      public static boolean isValidFormat(String billId)
      Static method to check if a billId is in the valid format. Used during bill checking prior to adding entries.
      Parameters:
      billId - String of billId to be format checked.

    • getBillId

      public String getBillId()
      Get Bill id.
      Returns:
      Returns id String.

    • getMemberId

      public String getMemberId()
      Get Member id.
      Returns:
      Returns id String.

    • getUsed

      public boolean getUsed()
      Get used boolean.
      Returns:
      Returns used boolean, true means previously used.

    • getUsedString

      public String getUsedString()
      Get used boolean as a string
      Returns:
      Returns used boolean as string, "true" means previously used.

    • getAmountString

      public String getAmountString()
      Get amount as a string
      Returns:
      Returns bill amount as a formatted string for printing.

    • getAmountStringNoFormat

      public String getAmountStringNoFormat()
      Get amount as a string, no format
      Returns:
      Returns bill amount as a string.

    • getNoEntries

      public int getNoEntries()
      Get number of entries the bill can purchase. Calculated as amount of bill / cost per entry.
      Returns:
      Returns integer of number of entries available.

    • getNoEntriesString

      public String getNoEntriesString()
      Get number of entries the bill can purchase as a string. Calculated as amount of bill / cost per entry.
      Returns:
      Returns number of entries available as string.

    • hasMemberId

      public boolean hasMemberId()
      Used to check if a bill has a member Id. Used during bill checking prior to adding entries.
      Returns:
      Boolean value, true if bill does have a memberId.

    • setUsed

      public void setUsed(boolean u)
      Set if the bill is used.
      Parameters:
      u - Boolean indicating new value, true means used.
